name: pipe-error-stop
description: Buffers a pipe until it ends. Only passes data onward if no error was emitted.

scripts.lint: node_modules/jshint/bin/jshint index.js --config jshint.conf.json && node_modules/jshint/bin/jshint test/pipe-error-stop.spec.js --config jshint.conf.json

author: Robert Balicki <robert.balicki@gmail.com>
